articles.title: Nvidia Has 65% of Its Portfolio Invested in 1 Brilliant Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock
articles.content: Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) first disclosed a stake in fellow semiconductor company Arm Holdings (NASDAQ: ARM) in the fourth quarter of 2023.  The position was valued at $147 million at the time, but a recently filed Form 13F shows the position is now worth more than $280 million and accounts for about 65% of Nvidia's $433 million stock portfolio.  To be clear, Nvidia has not added to its stake this year.

articles.title: Apple, Gen Z on personal finance: Wealth
articles.content: From trending tickers to how Gen Z is shaping the future of personal finance, Friday’s edition of Wealth! is here with the rundown.With Super Micro Computer (SMCI) facing a potential delisting from the Nasdaq, Yahoo Finance's Rachelle Akuffo explains what this means for shareholders and how to navigate over-the-counter markets (OTC). RBC gives Starbucks (SBUX) and Chipotle (CMG) an outperform rating, with price targets of $115 and $70, respectively.Finally, Apple (AAPL) could see a $256 increase in iPhone production costs if President-elect Trump's proposed China tariffs are enacted, according to Jefferies analyst Edison Lee.For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here. This post was written by Cindy Mizaku.
